art and audio in the game, ensuring correct display and playback. It is a child of the 'Finalize Assets' aggregate node for clarity in WBS.", "project_id": "Snake Eat Egg Project", "parent_task": "6", "child_tasks": ["10a"], "dependent_task": ["6a", "6b"], "estimated_effort_in_hours": 8.0, "status_reason": "Integration of final assets is needed for a polished game.", "outline_level": 4, "assigned_to": null, "required_skills": ["Programming", "Asset "Develop the main game loop and implement snake movement logic, including input handling and movement updates.", "project_id": "Snake Eat Egg Project", "parent_task": "2", "child_tasks": ["4b"], "dependent_task": ["2"], "estimated_effort_in_hours": 12.0, "status_reason": "Main game loop and movement are foundational for further mechanics.", "outline_level": 3, "assigned_to": null, "required_skills": ["Programming", "Game Development"], "is_milestone": false, "deliverables": ["Game Loop Code", "Snake Movement Implementation"], "status": "Not Started"}, {"id": "4b", "task_name": "project_id": "Snake Eat Egg Project", "parent_task": "4a", "child_tasks": ["7"], "dependent_task": ["4a"], "estimated_effort_in_hours": 12.0, "status_reason": "Egg spawning and collision detection "Collision Detection Implementation"], "status": "Not Started"}, {"id": "5", "task_name": "Design User Interface Layout", "task_description": "Design the layout for the game's user interface, including score display, start/restart buttons, and game over screen.", "project_id": "Snake Eat Egg Project", "parent_task": "2", "child_tasks": ["8"], "dependent_task": ["2"], "estimated_effort_in_hours": 8.0, "status_reason": "UI design is needed for user interaction.", "outline_level": 3, "assigned_to": null, "required_skills": ["UI/UX Design"], "is_milestone": false, consume eggs, update the score, and handle snake growth.", "project_id": "Snake Eat Egg Project", "parent_task": "4b", "child_tasks": ["10a"], "dependent_task": ["4b"], "estimated_effort_in_hours": ["Egg Consumption Logic", "Scoring System"], "status": "Not Started"}, {"id": "8", "task_name": "Implement User Interface", "task_description": "Develop the user interface based on the UI layout, including score display, buttons, and game over screen.", "project_id": "Snake Eat Egg Project", "parent_task": "5", "child_tasks": ["10a"], "dependent_task": ["5"], "estimated_effort_in_hours": 16.0, "status_reason": "UI implementation is required for user interaction.", "outline_level": 4, "assigned_to": null, "required_skills": ["Programming", "UI Development"], "is_milestone": false, "deliverables": ["UI Implementation"], "status": "Not Started"}, {"id": "10a", "task_name": "Conduct Playtesting Sessions", "task_description": "Organize and conduct playtesting sessions to gather feedback and identify bugs or gameplay issues.", "project_id": "Snake Eat Egg Project", "parent_task": null, "child_tasks": ["10b"], "dependent_task": ["7", "8", "9"], "estimated_effort_in_hours": "deliverables": ["Playtest Reports"], "status": "Not Started"}, {"id": "10b", "task_name": "Compile and Prioritize Bug List", "task_description": "Review playtesting feedback, compile a list of identified bugs and issues, and prioritize them for fixing.", "project_id": "Snake Eat Egg Project", "parent_task": "10a", "child_tasks": ["10c"], "dependent_task": ["10a"], "estimated_effort_in_hours": 4.0, "status_reason": "Prioritization ensures critical bugs are addressed first.", "outline_level": 6, "assigned_to": null, "required_skills": ["Testing", "Project Management"], "is_milestone": false, "deliverables": ["Prioritized Bug List"], "status": "Not Started"}, {"id": "10c", "task_name": "Fix Identified Bugs", "task_description": "Address and resolve the "status_reason": "Documentation and packaging are required for project completion.", "outline_level": 8, "assigned_to": null, "required_skills": ["Documentation", "Release Management"], {
  "task_list": [
    {
      "id": "1",
      "task_name": "Define Game Requirements and Scope",
      "task_description": "Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the Snake Eat Egg game, including gameplay mechanics, user interface, platforms, and performance expectations.",
      "project_id": "Snake Eat Egg Project",
      "parent_task": null,
      "child_tasks": [
        "2",
        "3"
      ],

      "status_reason": "Initial step to ensure clear understanding of project goals.",

      "assigned_to": {
        "id": "R1",
        "resource_name": "Business Analyst"
      },
      "required_skills": [
        "Requirements Analysis"
      ],
      "is_milestone": false,
      "deliverables": [
        "Requirements Document"
      ],
      "status": "Not Started"
    },
    {
      "id": "2",
      "task_name": "Design Game Architecture",
      "task_description": "Create the overall architecture for the game, including main modules (game loop, input handling, rendering, collision detection, scoring, etc.), and select the technology stack.",
      "project_id": "Snake Eat Egg Project",
      "parent_task": "1",
      "child_tasks": [
        "4a",
        "5"
      ],
      "dependent_task": [
        "1"
      ],

      "assigned_to": {
        "id": "R2",
        "resource_name": "Game Architect"
      },
      "required_skills": [
        "Game Design",
        "Software Architecture"
      ],
      "is_milestone": false,
      "deliverables": [
        "Architecture Diagram",
        "Technology Stack Decision"
      ],
      "status": "Not Started"
    },
    {
      "id": "3",
      "task_name": "Create Initial Art and Asset List",
      "task_description": "Identify and list all required game assets (snake sprites, egg sprites, background, UI elements, sound effects, etc.) and create initial placeholder art or source free assets.",
      "project_id": "Snake Eat Egg Project",
      "parent_task": "1",
      "child_tasks": [
        "6a",
        "6b"
      ],
      "dependent_task": [
        "1"

      ],
      "status": "Not Started"

task_list.task_description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the Snake Eat Egg game, including gameplay mechanics, user interface, platforms, and performance expectations.
task_list.status_reason: Initial step to ensure clear understanding of project goals.

task_list.task_description: Create the overall architecture for the game, including main modules (game loop, input handling, rendering, collision detection, scoring, etc.), and select the technology stack.
task_list.status_reason: Architecture design is required before implementation.

task_list.task_name: Create Initial Art and Asset List
task_list.task_description: Identify and list all required game assets (snake sprites, egg sprites, background, UI elements, sound effects, etc.) and create initial placeholder art or source free assets.
task_list.status_reason: Assets are needed for early development and prototyping.

task_list.task_description: Aggregate task representing the completion of both final art and audio assets, serving as a parent for asset integration.
Produce or source the final versions of all game art assets based on the asset list (sprites, backgrounds, UI elements, etc.).
task_list.status_reason: Final art assets are needed for game polish.

task_list.task_description: Produce or source the final versions of all game audio assets based on the asset list (sound effects, background music, etc.).
task_list.status_reason: Final audio assets are needed for game polish.

task_list.task_name: Integrate Art and Audio Assets into Game
task_list.task_description: Replace placeholder assets with final art and audio in the game, ensuring correct display and playback. This task requires both art (6a) and audio (6b) assets to be completed. It is a child of the 'Finalize Assets' aggregate node for clarity in WBS.
task_list.status_reason: Integration of final assets is needed for a polished game.

task_list.task_name: Implement Main Game Loop and Snake Movement
task_list.task_description: Develop the main game loop and implement snake movement logic, including input handling and movement updates.
task_list.status_reason: Main game loop and movement are foundational for further mechanics.

task_list.task_name: Implement Egg Spawning and Collision Detection
task_list.task_description: Implement logic for spawning eggs on the game field and detecting collisions between the snake and eggs or boundaries.
task_list.status_reason: Egg spawning and collision detection are essential for gameplay progression.

task_list.task_description: Design the layout for the game's user interface, including score display, start/restart buttons, and game over screen.
task_list.status_reason: UI design is needed for user interaction.

task_list.task_description: Develop the user interface based on the UI layout, including score display, buttons, and game over screen.
task_list.status_reason: UI implementation is required for user interaction.

task_list.task_name: Implement Egg Consumption and Scoring System
task_list.task_description: Develop the logic for the snake to consume eggs, update the score, and handle snake growth.
task_list.status_reason: Egg consumption and scoring are core gameplay features.

task_list.task_description: Organize and conduct playtesting sessions to gather feedback and identify bugs or gameplay issues.
task_list.status_reason: Playtesting is essential to identify issues and gather feedback.

task_list.task_description: Review playtesting feedback, compile a list of identified bugs and issues, and prioritize them for fixing.
task_list.status_reason: Prioritization ensures critical bugs are addressed first.

task_list.task_description: Address and resolve the prioritized bugs and issues found during playtesting.
task_list.status_reason: Bug fixing is required for a stable release.

task_list.task_name: Prepare Game Documentation and Release Package
task_list.task_description: Write user documentation, developer notes, and prepare the game for release (packaging, versioning, etc.).
task_list.status_reason: Documentation and packaging are required for project completion.

project.name: Snake Eat Egg Project
project.description: A project focused on developing a game or simulation where a snake eats eggs, likely inspired by the classic Snake game. The project may involve game design, programming, and testing of the snake's movement and egg consumption mechanics.
